content.text: Hi there, I hope you are having a great day!
Hey, thanks for asking! I am doing well. How about yourself?
I'm doing great as well! I'm currently teaching 1st grade, and I love it.
That's awesome! I always wanted to be a teacher, but I got too scared.
Don't be scared! It's a great profession. What do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home mom to my two kids. I love it, but I do miss having a career.
I can imagine! It's great that you're able to stay home with your kids.
Yeah, it's really important to me.
Yes, I have two dogs and a cat. They're my best friends!
That's awesome! I have a dog and a cat too.
